/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in different hues, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, the faint outline of mountains can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
